```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
theme_set(theme_classic())

thanksgiving_survey <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/refs/heads/main/data/2018/2018-11-20/thanksgiving_meals.csv")
```

```{r}
thanksgiving_survey %>% 
    count(celebrate)

thanksgiving_survey %>% 
    count(age) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(age, n)) +
    geom_col()
```
